name: auto_return
attributes: # [doc = " レンタル期間経過後に自動で返却処理を行うが、"]
# [doc = " rental_account.renter と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let rental = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_account ;
rental . auto_return_count = rental . auto_return_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . escrow_nft . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: rental_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = renter)] を指定して借り手照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: escrow_nft
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Escrow に保管された NFT のトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT を受け取るユーザーのトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI 実行用サービス権限アカウント"]

fields.name: token_program
fields.attribute: # [doc = " SPL トークンプログラム"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を行った貸し手の Pubkey"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を行った借り手の Pubkey"]

fields.name: auto_return_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 自動返却が実行された回数"]
